name: Kelly Criterion Calculator
description: Position sizing using Kelly Criterion with fractional Kelly support. Decimal-only calculations, configurable max position size, and risk-adjusted returns.
example_usage:
from library.components.trading.position_sizing import KellyCalculator
kelly = KellyCalculator(fraction=Decimal('0.5'))
size = kelly.calculate(win_rate=Decimal('0.55'), win_loss_ratio=Decimal('1.5'))
